titles.title: A bill for the relief of Vichai Sae Tung (also known as Chai Chaowasaree).
A bill for the relief of Vichai Sae Tung (also known as Chai Chaowasaree).

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Declares Vichai Sae Tung (also known as Chai Chaowasaree) to be considered to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
